unnormalised: Hey guys, any updates on Bumrah? Hope he recovers soon! Also, heard Pant had another checkup at Kokilaben Dhirubhai Ambani Hospital. Dr. Patel is optimistic, I believe. Wishing him a speedy recovery so he can smash those sixes again, right here in Mumbai! The news said 2000 sq ft of his farmhouse was damaged, poor guy. Rs. 5 Lakhs in damages reported, crazy! Come on, champ, get back on the field!
